segments.text: Please tell us the exact time when the big fire broke out .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The exact time ? Let me think . You know , it happened at night .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But we need the exact time . What time ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I remember . It was about 10 o'clock . When I was about to go to bed , suddenly I heard help outside .
segments.speaker: S2
